overview:
Frederic Kerrest is the COO and co-founder of Okta, the first cloud-based identity management platform. Founded in 2009, Okta helps companies of all sizes secure their users, applications and data — both in the cloud and behind the firewall — so work gets done, from any device, anywhere. Under Frederic’s leadership, Okta has grown into the leading identity solution with hundreds of enterprise customers.

Prior to co-founding Okta, Frederic worked at Hummer Winblad Venture Partners, where he evaluated enterprise software investment opportunities and helped portfolio companies strengthen their operations and distribution strategies. From 2002 to 2007, he worked at Salesforce.com in a variety of sales and business development roles, where he started and built the Latin America sales organization, Mobile group and OEM and Reseller programs. Frederic helped Salesforce.com grow from $30M to $750M+ in sales while personally delivering over $20M in subscriber revenue, and was a two-time Peak Performer Sales Award recipient. Prior to Salesforce.com, Frederic worked in a number of enterprise software development and management roles, where he wrote enterprise software for Sun Microsystems and Applied Materials, and co-founded and served as director of technology at an award-winning high-tech consulting firm in Latin America.

Frederic currently mentors entrepreneurs at the MIT Trust Center for Entrepreneurship and the Stanford StartX Student Startup Accelerator. He earned a BS in Computer Science from Stanford University and an MBA in Entrepreneurship & Innovation from the MIT Sloan School of Management where he was the 2008 MIT Patrick J. McGovern, Jr. Entrepreneurship Award recipient.
